name: rules.abbreviationAsWordInName
label: AbbreviationAsWordInName
description: Validates abbreviations (consecutive capital letters) length in identifier name, it also allows to enforce camel case naming.

name: rules.abstractClassName
label: AbstractClassName
description: Ensures that the names of abstract classes conforming to some pattern and check that abstract modifier exists.

name: rules.annotationLocation
label: AnnotationLocation
description: Checks location of annotation on language elements.

name: rules.annotationOnSameLine
label: AnnotationOnSameLine
description: Checks that annotations are located on the same line with their targets.

name: rules.annotationUseStyle
label: AnnotationUseStyle
description: Checks the style of elements in annotations.

name: rules.anonInnerLength
label: AnonInnerLength
description: Checks for long anonymous inner classes.

name: rules.arrayTrailingComma
label: ArrayTrailingComma
description: Checks that array initialization contains a trailing comma.

name: rules.arrayTypeStyle
label: ArrayTypeStyle
description: Checks the style of array type definitions.

name: rules.atclauseOrder
label: AtclauseOrder
description: Checks the order of javadoc block-tags or javadoc tags.

name: rules.avoidDoubleBraceInitialization
label: AvoidDoubleBraceInitialization
description: Detects double brace initialization.

name: rules.avoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters
label: AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters
description: Restricts using Unicode escapes (such as \u221e).

name: rules.avoidInlineConditionals
label: AvoidInlineConditionals
description: Detects inline conditionals.

name: rules.avoidNestedBlocks
label: AvoidNestedBlocks
description: Finds nested blocks (blocks that are used freely in the code).

name: rules.avoidNoArgumentSuperConstructorCall
label: AvoidNoArgumentSuperConstructorCall
description: Checks if call to superclass constructor without arguments is present.

name: rules.avoidStarImport
label: AvoidStarImport
description: Checks that there are no import statements that use the * notation.

name: rules.avoidStaticImport
label: AvoidStaticImport
description: Checks that there are no static import statements.

name: rules.booleanExpressionComplexity
label: BooleanExpressionComplexity
description: Restricts the number of boolean operators (&&, ||, &, | and ^) in an expression.

name: rules.catchParameterName
label: CatchParameterName
description: Checks that catch parameter names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.classDataAbstractionCoupling
label: ClassDataAbstractionCoupling
description: Measures the number of distinct classes that are instantiated within the given class or record.

name: rules.classFanOutComplexity
label: ClassFanOutComplexity
description: Checks the number of other types a given class/record/interface/enum/annotation relies on.

name: rules.classMemberImpliedModifier
label: ClassMemberImpliedModifier
description: Checks for implicit modifiers on nested types in classes and records.

name: rules.classTypeParameterName
label: ClassTypeParameterName
description: Checks that class type parameter names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.commentsIndentation
label: CommentsIndentation
description: Controls the indentation between comments and surrounding code.

name: rules.constantName
label: ConstantName
description: Checks that constant names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.constructorsDeclarationGrouping
label: ConstructorsDeclarationGrouping
description: Checks that all constructors are grouped together.

name: rules.covariantEquals
label: CovariantEquals
description: Checks that classes and records which define a covariant equals() method also override method equals(Object).

name: rules.customImportOrder
label: CustomImportOrder
description: Checks that the groups of import declarations appear in the order specified by the user.

name: rules.cyclomaticComplexity
label: CyclomaticComplexity
description: Checks cyclomatic complexity against a specified limit.

name: rules.declarationOrder
label: DeclarationOrder
description: Checks that the parts of a class, record, or interface declaration appear in the order suggested by the Code Conventions for the Java Programming Language.

name: rules.defaultComesLast
label: DefaultComesLast
description: Check that the default is after all the cases in a switch statement.

name: rules.descendantToken
label: DescendantToken
description: Checks for restricted tokens beneath other tokens.

name: rules.designForExtension
label: DesignForExtension
description: Checks that classes are designed for extension (subclass creation).

name: rules.emptyBlock
label: EmptyBlock
description: Checks for empty blocks.

name: rules.emptyCatchBlock
label: EmptyCatchBlock
description: Checks for empty catch blocks.

name: rules.emptyForInitializerPad
label: EmptyForInitializerPad
description: Checks the padding of an empty for initializer.

name: rules.emptyForIteratorPad
label: EmptyForIteratorPad
description: Checks the padding of an empty for iterator.

name: rules.emptyLineSeparator
label: EmptyLineSeparator
description: Checks for empty line separators before package, all import declarations, fields, constructors, methods, nested classes, static initializers and instance initializers.

name: rules.emptyStatement
label: EmptyStatement
description: Detects empty statements (standalone ';' semicolon).

name: rules.equalsAvoidNull
label: EqualsAvoidNull
description: Checks that any combination of String literals is on the left side of an equals() comparison.

name: rules.equalsHashCode
label: EqualsHashCode
description: Checks that classes that either override equals() or hashCode() also overrides the other.

name: rules.executableStatementCount
label: ExecutableStatementCount
description: Restricts the number of executable statements to a specified limit.

name: rules.explicitInitialization
label: ExplicitInitialization
description: Checks if any class or object member is explicitly initialized to default for its type value.

name: rules.fallThrough
label: FallThrough
description: Checks for fall-through in switch statements.

name: rules.fileLength
label: FileLength
description: Checks for long source files.

name: rules.fileTabCharacter
label: FileTabCharacter
description: Checks that there are no tab characters ('\t') in the source code.

name: rules.finalClass
label: FinalClass
description: Ensures that identifies classes that can be effectively declared as final are explicitly marked as final.

name: rules.finalLocalVariable
label: FinalLocalVariable
description: Checks that local variables that never have their values changed are declared final.

name: rules.finalParameters
label: FinalParameters
description: Checks that parameters for methods, constructors, catch and for-each blocks are final.

name: rules.genericWhitespace
label: GenericWhitespace
description: Checks that the whitespace around the Generic tokens (angle brackets) are correct to the typical convention.

name: rules.header
label: Header
description: Checks that a source file begins with a specified header.

name: rules.hiddenField
label: HiddenField
description: Checks that a local variable or a parameter does not shadow a field that is defined in the same class.

name: rules.hideUtilityClassConstructor
label: HideUtilityClassConstructor
description: Makes sure that utility classes do not have a public constructor.

name: rules.illegalCatch
label: IllegalCatch
description: Checks that certain exception types do not appear in a catch statement.

name: rules.illegalIdentifierName
label: IllegalIdentifierName
description: Checks identifiers against a regular expression pattern to detect illegal names.

name: rules.illegalImport
label: IllegalImport
description: Checks for imports from a set of illegal packages and modules.

name: rules.illegalInstantiation
label: IllegalInstantiation
description: Checks for illegal instantiations where a factory method is preferred.

name: rules.illegalThrows
label: IllegalThrows
description: Checks that specified types are not declared to be thrown.

name: rules.illegalToken
label: IllegalToken
description: Checks for illegal tokens.

name: rules.illegalTokenText
label: IllegalTokenText
description: Checks specified tokens text for matching an illegal pattern.

name: rules.illegalType
label: IllegalType
description: Checks that particular classes or interfaces are never used.

name: rules.importControl
label: ImportControl
description: Controls what can be imported in each package and file.

name: rules.importOrder
label: ImportOrder
description: Checks the ordering/grouping of imports.

name: rules.indentation
label: Indentation
description: Checks correct indentation of Java code.

name: rules.innerAssignment
label: InnerAssignment
description: Checks for assignments in subexpressions.

name: rules.innerTypeLast
label: InnerTypeLast
description: Checks nested classes/interfaces are declared at the bottom of the class.

name: rules.interfaceIsType
label: InterfaceIsType
description: Implements Joshua Bloch, Effective Java, Item 17 - Use Interfaces only to define types.

name: rules.interfaceMemberImpliedModifier
label: InterfaceMemberImpliedModifier
description: Checks for implicit modifiers on interface members and nested types.

name: rules.interfaceTypeParameterName
label: InterfaceTypeParameterName
description: Checks that interface type parameter names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.invalidJavadocPosition
label: InvalidJavadocPosition
description: Checks that Javadocs are located at the correct position.

name: rules.javaNCSS
label: JavaNCSS
description: Determines complexity of methods, classes and files by counting the Non Commenting Source Statements (NCSS).

name: rules.javadocBlockTagLocation
label: JavadocBlockTagLocation
description: Checks that a javadoc block tag appears only at the beginning of a line.

name: rules.javadocContentLocation
label: JavadocContentLocation
description: Checks that the Javadoc content begins from the same position for all Javadoc comments.

name: rules.javadocMethod
label: JavadocMethod
description: Checks the Javadoc of a method or constructor.

name: rules.javadocMissingLeadingAsterisk
label: JavadocMissingLeadingAsterisk
description: Checks if the javadoc has leading asterisks on each line.

name: rules.javadocMissingWhitespaceAfterAsterisk
label: JavadocMissingWhitespaceAfterAsterisk
description: Checks that there is at least one whitespace after the leading asterisk.

name: rules.javadocPackage
label: JavadocPackage
description: Checks that each Java package has a Javadoc file used for commenting.

name: rules.javadocParagraph
label: JavadocParagraph
description: Checks the Javadoc paragraph.

name: rules.javadocStyle
label: JavadocStyle
description: Validates Javadoc comments to help ensure they are well formed.

name: rules.javadocTagContinuationIndentation
label: JavadocTagContinuationIndentation
description: Checks the indentation of the continuation lines in block tags.

name: rules.javadocType
label: JavadocType
description: Checks the Javadoc comments for type definitions.

name: rules.javadocVariable
label: JavadocVariable
description: Checks that a variable has a Javadoc comment.

name: rules.lambdaBodyLength
label: LambdaBodyLength
description: Checks lambda body length.

name: rules.lambdaParameterName
label: LambdaParameterName
description: Checks lambda parameter names.

name: rules.leftCurly
label: LeftCurly
description: Checks for the placement of left curly braces for code blocks.

name: rules.lineLength
label: LineLength
description: Checks for long lines.

name: rules.localFinalVariableName
label: LocalFinalVariableName
description: Checks that local final variable names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.localVariableName
label: LocalVariableName
description: Checks that local, non-final variable names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.magicNumber
label: MagicNumber
description: Checks that there are no magic numbers.

name: rules.memberName
label: MemberName
description: Checks that instance variable names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.methodCount
label: MethodCount
description: Checks the number of methods declared in each type declaration.

name: rules.methodLength
label: MethodLength
description: Checks for long methods and constructors.

name: rules.methodName
label: MethodName
description: Checks that method names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.methodParamPad
label: MethodParamPad
description: Checks the padding between the identifier of a method definition and the left parenthesis.

name: rules.methodTypeParameterName
label: MethodTypeParameterName
description: Checks that method type parameter names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.missingCtor
label: MissingCtor
description: Checks that classes define a constructor and don't rely on the default one.

name: rules.missingDeprecated
label: MissingDeprecated
description: Verifies that the annotation @Deprecated and the Javadoc tag @deprecated are both present.

name: rules.missingJavadocMethod
label: MissingJavadocMethod
description: Checks for missing Javadoc comments for a method or constructor.

name: rules.missingJavadocPackage
label: MissingJavadocPackage
description: Checks for missing package definition Javadoc comments in package-info.java files.

name: rules.missingJavadocType
label: MissingJavadocType
description: Checks for missing Javadoc comments for class, enum, interface, and annotation interface definitions.

name: rules.missingNullCaseInSwitch
label: MissingNullCaseInSwitch
description: Checks that a switch statement has a null case label.

name: rules.missingOverride
label: MissingOverride
description: Verifies that the @Override annotation is present when the @inheritDoc javadoc tag is present.

name: rules.missingSwitchDefault
label: MissingSwitchDefault
description: Checks that switch statement has a default clause.

name: rules.modifiedControlVariable
label: ModifiedControlVariable
description: Checks that for loop control variables are not modified inside the for block.

name: rules.modifierOrder
label: ModifierOrder
description: Checks that the order of modifiers conforms to the Java Language specification.

name: rules.multipleStringLiterals
label: MultipleStringLiterals
description: Checks for multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file.

name: rules.multipleVariableDeclarations
label: MultipleVariableDeclarations
description: Checks that each variable declaration is in its own statement and on its own line.

name: rules.mutableException
label: MutableException
description: Ensures that exception classes are immutable.

name: rules.nPathComplexity
label: NPathComplexity
description: Checks the NPATH complexity against a specified limit.

name: rules.needBraces
label: NeedBraces
description: Checks for braces around code blocks.

name: rules.nestedForDepth
label: NestedForDepth
description: Restricts the depth of nested for loops.

name: rules.nestedIfDepth
label: NestedIfDepth
description: Restricts the depth of nested if-else statements.

name: rules.nestedTryDepth
label: NestedTryDepth
description: Restricts the depth of nested try-catch blocks.

name: rules.noCodeInFile
label: NoCodeInFile
description: Checks that a file contains only comments and no executable code.

name: rules.noFinalizer
label: NoFinalizer
description: Checks that finalize() methods are not used.

name: rules.noLineWrap
label: NoLineWrap
description: Checks that there are no line wraps where they are not allowed.

name: rules.nonEmptyAtclauseDescription
label: NonEmptyAtclauseDescription
description: Checks that Javadoc at-clauses have descriptions.

name: rules.oneStatementPerLine
label: OneStatementPerLine
description: Checks that there is only one statement per line.

name: rules.operatorWrap
label: OperatorWrap
description: Checks the wrapping of operators.

name: rules.outerTypeFilename
label: OuterTypeFilename
description: Checks that the outer type name matches the file name.

name: rules.packageAnnotation
label: PackageAnnotation
description: Checks that package annotations are in package-info.java.

name: rules.packageDeclaration
label: PackageDeclaration
description: Checks that a package declaration exists.

name: rules.parameterAssignment
label: ParameterAssignment
description: Disallows assignment to method parameters.

name: rules.parameterName
label: ParameterName
description: Checks that parameter names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.parenPad
label: ParenPad
description: Checks the padding of parentheses.

name: rules.regexp
label: Regexp
description: Checks source code against a regular expression.

name: rules.regexpHeader
label: RegexpHeader
description: Checks for a required header using a regular expression.

name: rules.regexpMultiline
label: RegexpMultiline
description: Checks multiline patterns.

name: rules.regexpSingleline
label: RegexpSingleline
description: Checks single-line patterns.

name: rules.returnCount
label: ReturnCount
description: Restricts the number of return statements.

name: rules.rightCurly
label: RightCurly
description: Checks the placement of right curly braces.

name: rules.separatorWrap
label: SeparatorWrap
description: Checks the wrapping of separators such as commas and dots.

name: rules.singleLineJavadoc
label: SingleLineJavadoc
description: Checks that single-line Javadoc comments are formatted correctly.

name: rules.staticVariableName
label: StaticVariableName
description: Checks that static, non-final variable names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.stringLiteralEquality
label: StringLiteralEquality
description: Checks that string literals are not compared using == or !=.

name: rules.summaryJavadoc
label: SummaryJavadoc
description: Checks that Javadoc summary sentences are well-formed.

name: rules.suppressWarnings
label: SuppressWarnings
description: Checks the use of @SuppressWarnings annotations.

name: rules.throwsCount
label: ThrowsCount
description: Restricts the number of exceptions declared in a throws clause.

name: rules.trailingComment
label: TrailingComment
description: Checks for trailing comments on the same line as code.

name: rules.typecastParenPad
label: TypecastParenPad
description: Checks the padding of parentheses for typecasts.

name: rules.typeName
label: TypeName
description: Checks that type names conform to a specified pattern.

name: rules.uncommentedMain
label: UncommentedMain
description: Checks that main methods are commented.

name: rules.unnecessaryParentheses
label: UnnecessaryParentheses
description: Checks for unnecessary parentheses.

name: rules.unusedImports
label: UnusedImports
description: Checks for unused import statements.

name: rules.upperEll
label: UpperEll
description: Checks that long literals use an upper-case 'L'.

name: rules.visibilityModifier
label: VisibilityModifier
description: Checks visibility modifiers on class members.

name: rules.whitespaceAfter
label: WhitespaceAfter
description: Checks that a token is followed by whitespace.

name: rules.whitespaceAround
label: WhitespaceAround
description: Checks that tokens are surrounded by whitespace.

name: rules.writeTag
label: WriteTag
description: Checks the use of @write Javadoc tags.
